item.description: sixteenth post 2/11/2024 got 4 days off from school which epic asf frfr gonna chill a ton might start a new civ 6 game soon but im busy trying to get the rss thing to work properly also i got a nice big map of singapore its pretty cool and im gonna go to new zealand now instead of singapore just cause singapore flights are so expensive its a robbery
